name: 張俊賢
objective:
本課程在介紹及闡述化學原理及物質之性質，著重於現代化學理論及概念之導入。內容包括氣體、計量化學、原子結構、化學鍵、物質狀態、能量轉換、酸鹼理論、氧化還原反應、金屬及非金屬元素、電化學、有機化學、核化學。
Introduction to the principles of chemistry and properties of matter, which are explained in terms of modern chemical theory with emphasis on conceptual problems. Individual topics include gas, stoichiometry, atomic structure, chemical bonding, and the states of matter, energy relation, acid-base theory and oxidation-reduction reactions, the chemistry of metallic and nonmetallic elements, nuclear chemistry.
schedule: 課程進度將依同學吸收程度隨時調整
scorePolicy: 每教完一章，隔週檢討，再隔週測試，採英文題目，全部成績的平均即為學期成績 (上課出席狀況加入學期成績之調整)
materials:
課堂上採用英文投影片
每章會提供練習題與解答
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG1：消除貧窮（No Poverty）SDG2：消除飢餓（Zero Hunger）SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）SDG10：減少不平等（Reduced Inequalities）
